name: SoftSwiss
tag_list: it, web-development, php-development, offshoring, nearshoring, dedicated-team, it-outsourcing, web-design, php, rubi-on-rails
overview:
SoftSwis is an austrian IT Service company with the development center in Belarus. The SoftSwiss team consists of specialists in mathematics and information technologies who have gained significant experience in numerous projects developed for clients worldwide. Professional Web Designers, Programmers and Front-End Programmers, Project Managers ans Account managers. SoftSwiss provides IT services in the area of software development and offshore staffing to small and medium size businesses. Our main focus is web technologies.

Common programming technolohies are Php, .NET, RoR, Flash.
